description:
Grading everything from commercials to feature films that have screened at prestigious film festivals, 
this fella has experience in HDR, ACES, and digital intermediate workflows.
clients_lead: Drew is a Colorist based out of Los Angeles, having spent many years working in the Utah film industry. He has amassed a lengthy list of clientele, ranging from big brand names to various ad agencies.
contact_lead: If you're looking for an experienced colorist based in Los Angeles, or if you need something graded remotely, I’d love to work with you. Describe your project below and I’ll send you a quote. (HOT TIP: Send him an album recommendation and you'll be his friend.)
